title: Did a Racist Who Followed a Black Man Home to Call Him a Racial Slur Have His Business Destroyed?
subtitle: Jeffrey Whitman told a local newspaper columnist he'd gone out of business after being caught on video calling a man the N-word.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A white man who followed an African-American motorist to his home after a road rage incident and called him a racial slur has lost his business.
